prev.title: Revenue: Issuing a Refund to a Customer

title: Revenue: Viewing a Revenue Report
body:
Revenue: Viewing a Revenue Report¶

Report displays a list of all revenue being reported.
The revenue records are listed by date, and each record displays other elements such as customer, description, and type.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Revenue

  4. Click Report

  5. Click on the revenue record to view payment details, payment allocations, the audit trail, and comments
rellinks: Revenue: Issuing a Refund to a Customer
toc: • Revenue: Viewing a Revenue Report
